entry.title: Am I making you feel Sick
entry.summary:
Author: fanofthegirl

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,484Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 52

Summary: Hal Jordan was dying long before a mission went wrong and his heart finally gave out.He was dying when he signed the divorce papers. Dying without making it anyone else’s problem.No one Noticed.Not Bruce. Not Clark. Not the Justice League.And Hal was fine with that because twenty months ago he signed away the right to have anyone worry about him.He would have kept it that way, too If he hadn’t burned himself out saving the world. If he hadn’t collapsed hard enough that everyone finally had to look.Now Bruce and Clark are hovering like they never spent nearly two years avoiding him. Acting like this is their burden to carry, like they didn’t already decide, once, that letting him go was easier than staying.Hal doesn’t understand it. There’s no cure. If Oa hasn’t found one, there’s no point in pretending otherwise. He’s made peace with dying.Bruce and Clark haven’t.They refuse to give up on him the way they gave up on the marriage. And that more than the poison in his blood or the ache in his chest is what hurts the most.Because Hal is still in love with them. And loving them while they fight to save him might be the one thing he can’t survive.

entry.title: 5 times people realize Batman has a favorite person and 1 time Hal finally knows who it is
entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,571Chapters: 5/7Kudos: 648

Summary: Batman doesn't have a favourite. He's not the type. He has never had a favourite—even among his own horde of children. Or so he thinks.Because that is a blatant lie. Anyone with eyes would say so. His friends, his family, his enemies, even Alfred the Cat can see it.Or hear it.Because it started with a nickname,"Spooky".

entry.summary:
Author: Frey_S

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 62,183Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 673

Summary: On top of Hal's list of things he hates are three things: charity galas, Gotham and Batman. So of course he ends up dealing with all of those in one night, even if he doesn't technically know he ends up sleeping with that last one. He's never letting Carol drag him to rich people events ever again. In which Hal dates Bruce Wayne. Tells him he's Green Lantern. Breaks up with him. And then sort of dates Batman without knowing that he is in fact sleeping with Bruce Wayne again.

entry.summary:
Author: Dust_Bunny_Meow

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 31

Summary: Hal Jordan is afraid he wouldn't be a good partner. He's afraid he wouldn't be a good father. He's afraid he'll fuck things up and doesn't even realize it.But with friends with benefits, he could get someone warm to hold at night and when the sun rises, they would part ways and never see each other again.That is what friends with benefits are supposed to be.Right?Then why is Hal living in Bruce's manor, eating his food and co-parenting his kids?Podfic of We're friends with benefits, right? by rie_rotisse

entry.title: Bruce how is the league your personal harem now?!?
entry.summary:
Author: Eclipsing_Light

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,738Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 28

Summary: This is a sequel to my previous work in my bat harem series, go read the other one first. After the impromptu identity reveal, courtesy of Dick, the league are all losing it (except for Dinah, she's fine) over Batman being Bruce Wayne. They all are totally whipped about it. Bruce is wishing he stayed part-time for the league, while also tackling a new kid to train (Jason), but hey at least he has a whole league willing to babysit for him. Except they're also trying to date him. Also fair warning, I proofread all these myself and also have no concept of when a chapter is too long. You have been warned.Rated teen for cursing and Hal's existence. Also I have a discord. Come join and give me recommendations. I need them.

entry.title: look at it from afar, take your time
entry.summary:
Author: strawberrylemontart

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,155Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 47

Summary: Seeing something in Hal's expression that worried him. Bruce was finally pushed over the edge. Leading Hal away from where it had been warmest downstairs in front of a fire. In the blink of an eye, Bruce's familiar bedroom was opened up to Hal and then the doors were closed behind them. Hal was left to awkwardly stand still before he was lushed to sit on the bed. Bouncing a little with the force of it before settling. "Promise you won't be upset with me?" Blinking up at Bruce with a confused look on his face, Hal promised, "I've upset you. How could I be upset with you?" ----- After a night of intimacy, Bruce seems further away from Hal than ever before. Confused at this turn of events, and with the mood so noticeable that the Justice League couldn't help but comment on it. Hal realized he really can't let Bruce suffer in silence anymore and goes to him without wanting to take no for an answer, to find out what's been bothering him.

entry.title: Talk 'Till There's No Lies
entry.summary:
Author: Skeletons_InYourCloset

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,343Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 67

Summary: For the record, Hal would like to say this was not his fault. After all, that girl was really hot—think of a desert storm wrapped in a human form, with hair like dust devils swirling in the sunset and a smile that could make a monk rethink his vows—and that's what he was up against. Anyone would’ve been distracted, okay? Superman would've taken a little longer to blink. Batman would’ve pretended he wasn’t affected, then brooded about it for six months. And Hal? Hal forgot where he was and long story short—she kissed him. When he pulled back, dazed and grinning like an idiot, his ring was gone. Next thing he knew, he was waking up—hands cuffed, ring still absent, ego thoroughly bruised. Now, it wasn’t like this was Hal’s first time getting kidnapped. Far from it. But this? This was a first. No alien warlords. No cosmic entities. Just… a woman hired to lure him in for some wacko wanting to get dirt on, here's the kicker, Spooky of all people. Crazy, right? Or, Hal gets kidnapped by your average Gotham crazy wanting to get a step ahead of Batman and ends up being saved like a damsel in distress. Bruce is, surprisingly, overprotective—bordering on solicitous—about the whole thing.

entry.title: live on in your eyes and not your mind
entry.summary:
Author: HC_Carter12

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,945Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 58

Summary: Despite what Clark seemed to think, Bruce was not nervous. Bruce was not only the third richest man in the world, a competent businessman and a father of seven. He was the goddamn Batman. Batman didn’t get nervous. “I’m just saying it would make sense if you were nervous about today,” said Clark, ignoring Bruce’s glare. “It’s not every day you have to interview your dead mom- who it turns out hasn’t been dead in years- because she magically mentored a former friend while he was dead, because now that friend has come back to life as well.” Bruce felt his eye begin to twitch behind the cowl’s lens. “Shut up, Clark.”   Hal Jordan was brought back to life, which would be great if it didn't involve Martha Wayne also being alive and Bruce not knowing a thing about it.
